name: Space Waste
description:
Your mission is to blast asteroids and keep space clean of garbage. Keep Space Waste management happy by recycling the good stuff, vaporizing the rest, and not losing your space-truck. Watch out for the aliens! They don't want you around. 50+ levels for hours of fun.
*** Give the game a try. Where else are you going to see a port-a-potty in space! ***
*** Quick game-play for between meetings or waiting for a ride ***

- Over 50 asteroid destroying missions! All for FREE!
- Each mission is gradually harder until it gets insane (What were we thinking?)
- Meet aliens then blow them up (Don't feel bad, its either you or them.)
- A compelling soundtrack (It's pretty quiet in space without music.)
- Thumb-pad or tap-to-shoot selection (Use the tap to shoot to free up your other hand for coffee).
- Vote for new features (make it your game.)
- Beautiful art optimized for your all the latest iPads
- Professional high-quality sound effects
- If you don't blast those Asteroids then who will?
- Asteroids, asteroids, asteroids, oh the humanity!

We love hearing from our game players. Vote for new features or email us your suggestions.
